name: Referral Program Designer
descriptions: Designs industry-specific referral programs based on a given topic or business type.
user_prompt: Design a tailored referral program strategy for the [industry] sector, including offer details, participation model, and optimization tips.

name: Draft Blog from Launch Document
descriptions: Creates a blog post using the provided launch document.
user_prompt: Using the product launch document available at [launch_doc_url], draft a compelling blog post. The content should clearly highlight key launch features, product value, and generate interest for readers to continue exploring the post.

name: Loyalty Program Optimization
descriptions: Evaluates loyalty programs in a given industry and suggests improvements.
user_prompt: Analyze and suggest improvements for a loyalty program within the [industry] industry, focusing on increasing customer retention and satisfaction.

name: A/B Testing Plan
descriptions: Develop an A/B testing plan for a website or app.
user_prompt: Create a comprehensive A/B testing plan for the [industry] industry to test variations in website or app design. Optimize key content elements, and improve overall conversion rates based on user behavior and performance metrics.

name: Create Content for a Talk at an Event
descriptions: Creates a session title, abstract, and track for a conference talk.
user_prompt: Generate a professional conference session title, abstract, and 60-minute talk track based on the uploaded event brief document [event_brief_doc_url]. Make sure the content aligns with the event's core theme and target audience.

name: Create Blog
descriptions: Generates a blog introduction based on a document.
user_prompt: Based on the uploaded document [document_url], generate a complete and well-structured blog post. Include an engaging introduction, key takeaways from the content, and a clear, informative conclusion. Ensure the tone is aligned with the document’s purpose.

name: Create Webinar Landing Page Copy
descriptions: Generates a landing page intro and titles for an upcoming webinar.
user_prompt: Generate 5 strong title options and an engaging abstract for a webinar on [topic], featuring [speakers_name], scheduled on [webinar_date] at [webinar_time]. Avoid overly promotional language and focus on clarity and relevance.

name: Market Expansion Strategy
descriptions: Designs a growth strategy by identifying new markets or customer segments.
user_prompt: Create a comprehensive market expansion strategy tailored for the [industry] sector. Identify untapped geographic regions or high-potential customer segments that align with growth goals and industry dynamics.

name: Prep for Follow-Up Call with Prospect
descriptions: Prepares a meeting summary and questions for a follow-up call with a prospect.
user_prompt: Summarize the last conversation with [customer_name] from [company_name], including any action items or follow-ups. Use the attached [documents] and extract relevant notes from [slack_channel] to help draft thoughtful questions for the upcoming follow-up call.

name: Draft Email from Call Transcript
descriptions: Generates an email summary based on a transcript of a customer call.
user_prompt: Review the customer conversation using the Teams call transcript from [teams_call_url], and draft a follow-up email summarizing concerns raised and clearly stating the next steps and responsible parties, all in plain text without using bullet points or numbered formatting.

name: Sales Contract Summary
descriptions: Summarizes contract terms and obligations from uploaded documents.
user_prompt: Analyze the uploaded [sale_contract] and summarize the key contract terms, including payment structure, project deliverables, deadlines, and any automatic renewal clauses or obligations mentioned.

name: Draft High Priority Email
descriptions: Creates a task reminder email using content from a prior message.
user_prompt: Using the provided [email] content, write a concise and professional reminder message that highlights the urgency and summarizes the task that needs follow-up or action.

name: Summarize the Deal Progression
descriptions: Summarize the latest status, asks, and next steps in the deal progression based on Slack and meeting notes.
user_prompt: Summarize the latest updates, requests, and pending actions in the [company] deal based on the notes from [slack_channel] and [meeting_url], including where the deal currently stands in the pipeline.

name: Create a Meeting Agenda for a Contract Review
descriptions: Creates a structured meeting agenda for contract review alignment.
user_prompt: Based on the [meeting_url] and contract review topic [topic], create a clear and structured meeting agenda that aligns participants on recommendations and responsibilities.

name: Outline and Simplify Investment Summary
descriptions: Simplifies financial investment summaries into clear, investor-friendly formats.
user_prompt: Use the uploaded financial report [uploaded_file] to generate a simplified investment summary, focusing on investor-friendly language, key metrics, and overall performance insights.

name: Presentation outline for scenario planning
descriptions: Creates a strategic scenario-based presentation outline from uploaded analysis documents.
user_prompt: Based on the uploaded analysis document [uploaded_file], generate a structured presentation outline that includes scenario-based projections, risk factors, and strategic recommendations.

name: Contract Summary Generator
descriptions: Summarizes uploaded legal contracts into 5 concise paragraphs.
user_prompt: Summarize the uploaded legal contract [uploaded_file] into 5 clear paragraphs, highlighting deliverables, payment terms, liability clauses, and intellectual property details.

name: Finance Process Training Guide
descriptions: Creates a structured onboarding guide for new hires covering key finance processes.
user_prompt: Create a new hire training guide for the finance team that includes step-by-step processes, key tools, and common challenges for [topic_1] and [topic_2].

name: Financial Proposal Considerations
descriptions: Analyzes financial proposals and generates additional considerations grouped by category.
user_prompt: Evaluate the uploaded financial proposal [uploaded_file] and outline additional considerations grouped by compliance, tax, reporting, and operations, with reasoning for each.

name: Generate Interview Question
descriptions: Generates a tailored list of interview questions and explanations based on a job description and focus areas.
user_prompt: Generate 10 tailored interview questions using this [job_description] and targeting the [focus_areas], with explanations for assessing both technical and behavioral competencies.

name: Summarize Interview Feedback
descriptions: Summarizes candidate interview feedback packets into structured, decision-ready reports.
user_prompt: Summarize the uploaded interview feedback file [uploaded_feedback_file] into a decision-ready report highlighting strengths, concerns, opinions, and suggested next steps.

name: Summarise Security Pull Request
descriptions: Analyzes code changes in a GitHub pull request for security vulnerabilities and summarizes key findings.
user_prompt: Analyze the GitHub pull request at [github_pr_url] to detect any security vulnerabilities or improvements, and summarize the key findings in a security-focused report.

name: Generate Onboarding Checklist
descriptions: Generates a personalized onboarding checklist using company docs and employee details.
user_prompt: Using the uploaded onboarding document [uploaded_doc], generate a 10-step checklist for a new hire joining as [role] in the [department] starting on [start_date], covering all essential tasks for a smooth first week.

name: Employee Announcement
descriptions: Creates a warm and engaging announcement post for social media to introduce new hires.
user_prompt: Create a warm and professional LinkedIn post announcing that [employee_name] has joined our [team] team as a [role]. Format it for publishing on [social_media_channel].

name: Communicate Change Rollout
descriptions: Drafts a professional internal email communication about upcoming system changes, including impact and support contact.
user_prompt: Draft an internal email announcing the rollout of [change_description], planned for [planned_date], including its impact on [affected_systems] and support contact details.

name: Rewrite Legal Clauses
descriptions: Rewrites legal clauses into a simpler or specified tone while maintaining their legal accuracy.
user_prompt: Rewrite the legal clause '[clause_text]' into a [target_tone] tone, ensuring it retains its legal intent while being easier to understand.

name: Extract Contract Key Data
descriptions: Extracts essential legal terms such as contract duration, renewal options, and termination clauses from uploaded contracts.
user_prompt: Extract key legal data such as contract term, renewal options, and termination clauses from the uploaded contract [uploaded_contract]. Present the findings in a clear and structured summary without altering the original legal language.

name: Compare Legal Contracts
descriptions: Compares two contracts and highlights key differences in legal terms that could affect obligations or risk exposure.
user_prompt: Compare the two uploaded contracts — [first_contract] and [second_contract] — highlighting differences in parties, dates, obligations, payment terms, termination clauses, and governing law.

name: Check Contract Completeness
descriptions: Reviews a contract to identify missing essential elements such as signatures, payment terms, governing law, and checks for blank or incomplete pages.
user_prompt: Review the uploaded contract [uploaded_contract] and list any missing elements such as signatures, payment terms, governing law, or incomplete sections.

name: Task Extractor from Text
descriptions: Identifies action items, tasks, or to-dos from uploaded text and presents them in a clean checklist format.
user_prompt: Analyze the uploaded doc [uploaded_doc] and extract all action items, tasks, or to-do points in a clear bullet format.
